summary: Successfully verified that the task count display issue has been RESOLVED. The Tasks tab in project details navigation now correctly shows 9 tasks instead of 0. Backend API endpoints are working correctly, and the frontend fix for the /api/tasks/ endpoint (with trailing slash) is functioning properly. Tasks are loading and displaying correctly in the project details page.

resolved_issues.issue: Frontend was calling /api/tasks without trailing slash causing 307 redirects
resolved_issues.fix_applied: Updated frontend to use /api/tasks/ endpoint with trailing slash
resolved_issues.verification: Backend test confirms both project.task_count and actual tasks returned are 9

minor_issues.issue: Mixed content error - HTTP request from HTTPS page
minor_issues.impact: Does not affect task count functionality but may affect user display

resolved_issues.issue: Tasks tab showed 0 count instead of actual task count (9)
resolved_issues.fix_applied: Updated API endpoint calls to use /api/tasks/ with trailing slash
resolved_issues.verification: Tasks tab now correctly displays 'Tasks9' in navigation

minor_issues.issue: Mixed content errors for user-related API calls

passed_tests: Backend API authentication with demo credentials
Project details API endpoint returning correct data
Task count field in project object matches actual tasks (9)
Tasks API endpoint /api/tasks/ returning 9 tasks for project proj-4bee725235ee
Project navigation from projects list to project details
Project details page loading with correct project information
Tasks tab navigation showing correct count (9 instead of 0)
Tasks tab content loading and displaying tasks correctly
Task elements rendering in the UI (298 task-related elements found)
No critical error messages in the frontend
Project details page responsive design and layout
action_item_for_main_agent: ISSUE RESOLVED: Task count display is now working correctly. Minor recommendation: Fix mixed content errors for user API calls by ensuring all API endpoints use HTTPS consistently. The main functionality is working as expected.
